refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The topic element is a general-purpose container designed to be semantically neutral with respect to any narrative flow. Like most “component level” elements in DocBook, it can hold block elements optionally followed by one or more sections.
Topics are most often associated with topic-oriented authoring methodologies. Topic-oriented authoring is discussed in more detail in .

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Formatted as a displayed block. Sometimes topics are numbered.
